title: Tuzigoot National Monument: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility          The visitor center and the Tavasci Marsh Overlook trail are wheelchair accessible. Wheeled vehicles, such as wheelchairs and baby strollers, may not be able to access the Ruins trail, due to a steep portion near the beginning. Access to the top of Tuzigoot Pueblo Tower requires stairs. We do not have any wheelchairs for use while at the monument. Please contact the visitor center with any other questions at (928) 634-5564.
